page.title: 09My Spare Time
page.content:
In my family the usual time we get up while on holiday from school is around nine o'clock. I get dressed and go for a wash, so does everyone else, we all have breakfast together. I usually do the same thing everyday. In the morning I go for a game of football with all the other lads around my house.
After lunch I go to my friend's house with my brother, we spend the afternoon watching videos on my friend's TV. About five o'clock we go home for tea.
In the evening I do one of three things. Watch TV, go to the leisure centre to play pool or another sport or play computer games at home. I play computer games most often.
